title: Need help with "scanning" nearby BaseParts (or Models)

posts.content_html:
I’m looking for a way to reliably (and hopefully as lag-free as possible) check the player’s surroundings for BaseParts that contain for example a specific folder called “Values”, i have searched on forums a bit but couldn’t find a good answer. I have thought about running a [while task.wait(0.5) do] loop but i thought it would be laggy since it needs to run on the server for every single player character, which in highly populated servers might cause lag, i am not sure if it would create significant lag or not, ANY help is appreciated (References to other posts, clarifications, examples.)
Thanks!
